html:
ECCOTYRES RETREADING INDIA PVT LTD

CIN: U52590MH2022PTC338801

GST NO: 27AAHCE0705G1ZZ

Name : {{doc.name}}

üìç B 43 & 44, Platinum Springs, Opposite Dena Bank, Taloja, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 410208.

üìû Customercare: +91 7304420063   ‚úâ accounts@eccotyres.in   üåê www.eccotyres.in
name: Demo

html:
Sales Invoice

Invoice No: {{doc.name}}

Invoice Date: {{doc.get_formatted("posting_date")}}

Due Date: {{doc.get_formatted("due_date") }}

{% set addressinfo= frappe.get_doc('Address',"Ascra Healthcare-Billing") %}

Billed By

{{ doc.company }}

{{ addressinfo.address_line1 }}

{{ addressinfo.address_line2 }}

{{ addressinfo.city }},{{ addressinfo.state }},{{ addressinfo.country }} - {{ addressinfo.pincode }}

GSTIN: {{ addressinfo.gstin}}

Billed To

{{ doc.customer }}
{{doc.address_display}}

Product Details

{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr. No. Item Quantity Rate Amount GST Rate CGST SGST IGST Total
{{loop.index}} {{ row.item_name}} {{ row.qty }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(row.rate) }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(row.amount) }} {{ row.item_tax_template }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(row.cgst_amount) }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(row.sgst_amount) }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(row.igst_amount) }} {{ "{:.2f}".format(doc.grand_total) }}
Amount {{ "{:.2f}".format(doc.total) }}
Taxes {{ "{:.2f}".format(doc.total_taxes_and_charges) }}
Total (INR) {{ "{:.2f}".format(doc.grand_total) }}

Terms and Conditions

  1. Please pay within 15 days from the date of invoice, overdue interest @ 14% will be charged on delayed payments.
  2. Please quote invoice number when remitting funds.
name: Madical Bill
Refurb Purchase Invoice

html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Job Offer

Purchase Order
{{doc.name}}

{{doc.supplier_name}}

Sr Item Name Description Qty Rate Amount

Item Code: {{ row.item_code}} {%- endif %}
{{ row.description }}
 {{ row.qty }} {{ row.uom or row.stock_uom }} {{ row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
{{doc.total}}
{{doc.grand_total}}
{{doc.in_words}}
name: Drop Shipping Format

html:
{{ company }}
{{ __("POS No : ") }} {{ offline_pos_name }}

{{ __("Customer") }}: {{ customer }}

{{ __("Date") }}: {{ dateutil.global_date_format(posting_date) }}

{% for item in items %} {% endfor %}
{{ __("Item") }} {{ __("Qty") }} {{ __("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_name }} {{ format_number(item.qty, null,precision("difference")) }}
@ {{ format_currency(item.rate, currency) }}		 {{ format_currency(item.amount, currency) }}
{% for row in taxes %} {% if not row.included_in_print_rate %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% if discount_amount %} {% endif %}
{{ __("Net Total") }} {{ format_currency(total, currency) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ format_currency(row.tax_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Discount") }} {{ format_currency(discount_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Grand Total") }} {{ format_currency(grand_total, currency) }}
{{ __("Paid Amount") }} {{ format_currency(paid_amount, currency) }}
{{ __("Qty Total") }} {{ qty_total }}

{{ terms }}

{{ __("Thank you, please visit again.") }}
name: Point of Sale
